column4: anyone else having problems downloading flashplayer from adobe?
other than having to maunally install it, no
its hella slow for me the last two days..
I'll check it
speed's fine for me
must be the hops between me and adobe
can you send me the tar.gz?
yes, I'll re-download it (just deleted it again) but my upload's only 128k so it could be slow
its probably faster than .1-.3kb/s
i would appreciate it
it's coming your way now
have you noticed the file transfer?
i noticed.. its not grabbing the file
strange. Do you want me to try it again?
nah.. i'll just wait the hour and a half or so left on the transfer from adobe. ;)
thanks for trying tho
ok. I feel sorry for you though, I thought internet in NZ was bad but yours must be truly shocking. Or is it just adobe?
its just adobe.. i'm getting 300-400kb/s from ubuntu servers
try accessing the file through a cache
i looked for mirrors.. they all point to the same adobe download
I meant a web-cache, not a mirror. google doesn't cache it, but others might.
googled "index of" and the filename.. ;)
